titleStmt.title: A proclamation, against keeping of conventicles. Edinburgh, the third day of August, one thousand six hundred and sixty nine.
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.
Gibson, Alexander, Sir, d. 1693.
Scotland. Sovereign (1649-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to his the King's excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Signed: Al. Gibson, Cls. Sti. Concilii.
